content: Hi, I'm curious if https://github.com/rust-lang/compiler-team/issues/499 will be discussed at this week's meeting? It was filed last Wednesday and I looked at last Thursday's meeting minutes and didn't see it mentioned. The minutes said there were no new MCPs, so I just want to make sure it didn't fall through the cracks.

I'll try to answer (though not 100% sure). I _think_ the MCP missed last week's meeting because it was opened less than a day before the meeting, so I assume it was my fault I didn't include the last changes (I prepare T-compiler's agenda), if so I apologize.
However the MCP was seconded by @Wesley Wiser (T-compiler co-lead) so I'd say the MCP didn't miss a beat.
This week https://github.com/rust-lang/compiler-team/issues/499 will appear in the team's agenda anyway, as it should.
